title: New: Theme Park – Tonight
body:
After the premiere of, _Tonight_, the 3rd single to some from the debut **Theme Park** record, we now finally have access to the track in slightly more convenient means.

Although my interest in the band had been flagging in recent months, it’s this gloriously camp and blissed out little jam that’s sucked my right back in.

The band also announced the record will be self-titled and released on the 25th of February.

Stream the new single below.

Although my interest in the band had been flagging in recent months, it’s this gloriously camp and blissed out little jam that’s sucked my right back \[…\]
